body_html:
Hi @TSchmiedlechner , have you tried your script on the latese master branch?
I can repro this OOM on pytorch 0.3.1 but not on the master branch. The memory consumption is pretty stable on master.
Could you also give it a try and confirm? Thanks!

body:
Hi @TSchmiedlechner , have you tried your script on the latese master branch?
I can repro this OOM on pytorch 0.3.1 but not on the master branch. The memory consumption is pretty stable on master. 
Could you also give it a try and confirm? Thanks!
